Catalysis Video History Series

The history of Catalysis Video Series presents historical lectures from national catalysis meetings from the 1930's to the present.  We are sponsored and part of the North American Catalysis Society.
If you have any comments, corrections or factual additions, please email us at
websupport@video-history-catalysis.org
The videos are for educational purposes only.
Visit our video youtube hosting site and subscribe to our channel to receive email updates whenever
a new video is posted.
(If you subscribe, next to the subscribe  button, there is a little bell. Click and check the box to receive, email notification of new videos).
Watch Burt Davis describe his 30+ year interest in creating videos to record the history of catalysis.
His efforts are what has made this video history possible.
